itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide.

item.name: Rhino Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted rhino corpse.

item.name: Pig Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted pig corpse.

item.name: Ox Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted cow corpse.

item.name: Sharp Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Sharp Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Wagon Registration: Strong Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Strong Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 10, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Fine Tough Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Lucky Sharp Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals. It increases Luck when Gathering.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Lucky Sharp Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals. It increases Luck when Gathering.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired
